author: felixweber
title: Ryuki Funding
description: The Catalyst Community needs a fast & community driven mechanism to reward & fund engagements & activities besides submitting proposals.
solution: Create a Socio-Financial Community Treasury defined as holocratic, united network of coordinated project based Stake Pools & Treasuries
experience: An Assembly of well established Catalyst Community Projects, SPOs, Catalyst Circle Members, Funded Proposers, Community Advisors and Mentors
